node.title: This is me learning
node.excerpt: I know most people see this on Facebook and what not, but I like putting it here. It's more organized!

node.title: Check your emails
node.excerpt: Well, that was fun. I got up bright and early for a job in sunny (cold) Otaki. I was sitting in the car for 20 minutes, waiting for my security escort to show up before I went to my phone to figure out why it was so late.

node.title: Logistics
node.excerpt: Today was Tuesday. I'm striving to just write about my days more often here, at least when work allows me to. I really don't think anyone will be that interested in it! It's more of a journal - but putting it out here for the world to see is a good way to keep me accountable.

node.title: When I get that feeling
node.excerpt: It's been a little slow at work these past few weeks. I've had a few early starts, but other than that I've generally been home by about 7pm. It's unsettling! When work gets intense I can be out until close to midnight, but when there are no urgent calls coming in I just sit around at home… waiting.

node.title: Turns out? I'm not an asshole
node.excerpt: Shit I’m old. I turned a grand age of 34 on Monday. But let’s not panic, I’m not frail and fatigued yet!

node.title: Lament
node.excerpt:
Breaking news

A 2011 Mazda Demio is for sale.

node.title: It's a game of give and take
node.excerpt: My first day off in about three weeks? I slept a lot!

node.title: You Can Never Know What It's Like
node.excerpt: It’s never two years.

node.title: Anxiety
node.excerpt: Do you get anxious?

node.title: Staging
node.excerpt: What a fun start to the week.

node.title: The appalling state of Caramel in this country
node.excerpt: As some of you may already know, I have a vendetta: The quality of caramel slices in this country is appalling.

node.title: My Mother, My Mother and Me
node.excerpt: Well, that was one hell of a week. My work days were long hours, but it was, frustratingly, a lot of waiting around. Oddly, I’d rather be working hard for 14 hours than trying to sort out scheduling and logistics.

node.title: Trying out video: Life Update
node.excerpt: Well, rather than writing I opted for a video update this time. 4 minutes of it!

node.title: Rate My Tinder Profile
node.excerpt: I am still sick.

node.title: I got Tonsillitis
node.excerpt: I came back from training in Auckland last week feeling awful - sweaty, sore, weak and disoriented. It had been slowly escalating during the week, but after my flight back it was destroying me.

node.title: Uninteresting
node.excerpt: Well, training here is going well! It's intimidating to understand a big and complicated machine, but the boss man Karl ensures us it's not as bad as it looks. It's all sensors and belts and mechanicalness.

node.title: Cookies
node.excerpt: Eat your heart out, Toffee Pops.

node.title: Can you feel life tangle you up inside
node.excerpt: I’m good!

node.title: Tell me the song and I'll sing it
node.excerpt: Well, that was helpful.

node.title: And I am feeling so small
node.excerpt: It's an odd dichotomy.
